TextBody:
Hello,

Please make sure you are logged in using the root account or another epp admin account with 'super admin' rights.
You should be able to change the admin's password from the following location. Please note that the old password is not needed, only the new password needs to be configured twice as a confirmation. Make sure it is indeed a new password and not an old password which you might have used in the past.



Let us know the results.

Thank you and Best regards,
Alin
ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0BhHSI:ref

TextBody:
Hello,

If you'd like we can schedule a remote session and reset the root admin's password to the default value from the backend of the appliance. Then you can try to update it from server UI.
If you'd like that let me know your timezone and availability for a Zoom session for tomorrow.
I see the server UI is in German. Please let me know if you do not speak English, in which case I can discuss with one of my colleagues who speaks German to reach out to you.

Thank you and Best regards,
Alin

Hello,

If you'd like that let me know your timezone and availability for a Zoom session for tomorrow.

Thank you and Best regards,
Alin
